project.description: Create a filesystem timeline with fls and mactime for analysis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISK_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the disk image to create the filesystem timeline from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISK_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the disk for output

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build the output path.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the timeline output file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TIMEZONE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Timezone of the system under analysis
